snippet.title: earthquake \- definition of earthquake by the Free Online ...
snippet.description:
* earthquake \- definition of earthquake by the Free Online ...
www.thefreedictionary.com/earthquake Cached
earth·quake (ûrth′kwāk′) n. A sudden movement of the earth's crust caused by the release of stress accumulated along geologic faults or by volcanic activity.
